trends: There have been 70 other sightings in Columbus
There were no other sightings in Columbus on or around January 19th 2009
divs: Sighting DetailsI taking my dog out before bed and I was looking down and then I noticed a moving light above me (and by above me I don���t mean right above me.... it was really high up there) and as soon as I lifted my head the light (which looked like a "shooting star" at first) went screaming across the sky, then instead of following a natural curve falling toward the ground it tailed upwards and then was gone. More than likely it was still a "shooting star" but if anyone else saw something that night maybe it would help. And the only reason I���m reporting it is because I was stunned by the movement of it. It did NOT seem normal.
